/#homeHeroBlue About ARC Investments ARC Investments is a private, professional property management company specializing in the operation of manufactured home communities and self storage facilities . With over forty years of experience, ARC has a proven track record of Commitment and Expertise. We achieve high quality results that benefit community residents and owners alike. Family owned and operated from the start, ARC's management approach is straight-forward and honest. We set high standards for our personnel and our properties. Our professional staff strives for a long and positive relationship with every resident. We want the communities we operate to be places that homeowners are proud to call "home." ARC's business philosophy recognizes the symbiotic relationship between community residents and the community owner. We seek to maximize value to both through proactive, hands-on management focused on maintenance and improvement of the many facets of community quality. The standards we set for our company over thirty years ago are still very much a part of our philosophy today: competent, friendly personnel, and quality communities that reflect the values of our residents and our company. Welcome to Vista! /#ovSi
About
ARC Investments is excited to announce the recent addition of Sugar Mill North to the management portfolio. We are thrilled to be able to broaden our portfolio and extend our management style to an additional community in Saint Cloud.
Sugar Mill North (formerly Sandhill Cove) is a tranquil 55+ community located off of Brown Chapel Road that caters to the active 55+ lifestyle. This exclusive  community has extensive amenities and NEW homes available for purchase. We are sure that Sugar Mill North will be a great place for you to call home for years to come!
